vsn.aka: Modernist revival- celebrating the certainty of the scientific method and the life space provided by its incompleteness. Interpreting this into contexts as long running projects
vsn.path: implies Romanticism built over conservative modernsit values, critical of postmodernism, which implies optimism on the human condition and faith

role.nl: An inside club - a campus - a critical, romantic agent

attribute.how: a project running for finite time

does.nl: Defending the Idea of Modernist Revival, Scientific Realism
does.onBelief: There are desirable actions that arise in the right environment

intent.nl: create an optimal environment of understanding with the public

strategy.nl: being honest and clear, some kind of a charter

domain.nl: contemproary issues with knowledge and justifying intervention

action.nl: Why Projects like this should exist, the idea of the critical organization
Heritage of critical truth examination- Descartes, Thoreau to Gandhi and Hippies

domain.nl: mainstream would always need to be challenged on these aspects

action.nl: Universal and Flat Ideas- Direct and Cloud Computing
Destructuration-Runaway technology embrace, anxiety over survival, transhumanism

Pragmatism overrun- Broadly utilitarian policies and computing

theme.lbl: What we Do, why are we here?

action.nl: Simply Believe-We are simply a group which believes in some values-modernism, romanticism
